text: Facebook uses it internally. Git really doesn't scale well with larger repos, which some of these companies have since everything goes into one repo.

text: I'm not sure I'd agree with git being more efficient. Mercurial makes it easy to visit a child commit from a parent, this is not easy to do in git. Try Fossil - I've read it's more intuitive than git.
